name: The Villain and the Gentleman Demo
name_original: The Villain and the Gentleman Demo
description:
In the mystic city of Crimson, home to the forever moon, an unlikely duo team up to uncover the cities mysteries. Meet Demetri and Max in this preview of the first chapter of the visual novel. 

Windows Only 

This is an alpha demo and isn't definitive of the final product, with many additions and changes planned for the final release (TBA).  

Follow  @The_V_and_G on Twitter for more updates!!

Others involved with the project/assets:

Character Designs @littlemiudreams on Twitter

CG Designs @hey_arctic on Twitter

Music @CthuluSeeker on Twitter and Andres

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Kickstarter coming soon!
